<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

</MethodEndpoint>



Changes the format of the downloaded archive from .zip to .tar.gz. This method uses the body parameters.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
